code: export var getAssignedClientIds=function getAssignedClientIds(){var assignedClientIds=localStorage.getItem('assigned_clients')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('assigned_clients')):[];return assignedClientIds;};export var assignClientIds=function assignClientIds(clientIdArr){if(clientIdArr.length){localStorage.setItem('assigned_clients',JSON.stringify(clientIdArr));}else{localStorage.removeItem('assigned_clients');}};export var removeClientId=function removeClientId(clientId){var assignedClientIds=localStorage.getItem('assigned_clients')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('assigned_clients')):null;if(!assignedClientIds){return false;}var updatedAssignedClientIds=assignedClientIds===null||assignedClientIds===void 0?void 0:assignedClientIds.filter(function(assignedClientId){return assignedClientId!==clientId;});localStorage.setItem('assigned_clients',JSON.stringify(updatedAssignedClientIds));return true;};
